cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-swap.description:
Description

This check implements
C.83
,
C.84
and
C.85
from the C++ Core Guidelines.

The
cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-swap check
is an alias, please see
performance-noexcept-swap
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-swap.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
